page.title: 14TUR 1
page.content: A typical workshop will include the folling main sections-stripping and dismantling, initial inspection, welding and fabrication, machining and final testing.There is not much work for the workshop now in 1985. The planners job is to ensure that the workdhop is ready for work when the men come in and control jobs in progress. They have a medical center were the men get taken before they go to hospitalfor treatment. The coal cutter has a blade at the front, a gear box at the back and an engine in the middle. The planners job is to ensure that the workshop is ready for work. The workshop manager is responsable for all workshop activitys, both engineering and staff.
